com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.datapollingservice
Class PollingThreadGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.datapollingservice.PollingThreadGenerator

public class PollingThreadGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Loads polling definitions that are scheduled to run along with their corresponding devices. Generates threads to execute those poll in a controlled manner. How devices/polls are broken up into threads will control the throttling of SNMP polling traffic.

Method Detail

execute

public void execute(int increment)
Loads polling definitions and corresponding devices. Spawns polling threads using this data.

Parameters:
increment - - used to determine which polling intervals should be executed during this pass. -1 will execute all polls

setDeviceTypeCount

public static void setDeviceTypeCount(int count)
Sets the DEVICE_TYPE_COUNT used when initializing hashtable sizes.

Parameters:
count - - Number device types in the polling definitions database table
